founder.name: Carla Carvajal
founder.title: Founder & Lead Science Educator
founder.education: Bachelor's degree in Chemical Engineering (Veracruz Technological Institute, graduated with honors)
founder.background: Passionate science educator with over a decade of experience making science accessible and exciting. Former bilingual Physics and Chemistry teacher at Green Oaks School for 7 years, where students consistently won Physics and Chemistry Olympics at state and national levels.
roles: Creator & Host of 'A Pinch of Science' on Televisa Veracruz
Founder of Carls Newton Science Camp (2021)
Creator of Carls Newton Science Rocks! Live Shows (2025)
certifications: STEM Educator Certification by STEM.org (in progress)
founder.philosophy: Every child has an innate curiosity about how the world works. My role isn't to fill students with facts, but to nurture that curiosity, teach them how to ask questions, and give them the tools to discover answers themselves.
founder.media: Creator and host of 'A Pinch of Science' on Televisa Veracruz's morning show, bringing scientific concepts to thousands of viewers weekly. Active Instagram community sharing daily scientific facts and experiments.

packages.name: Preschool Special
packages.description: Age-appropriate science fun designed specifically for our youngest scientists with safe, engaging demonstrations

packages.name: Classic Show
packages.description: Interactive science show with spectacular experiments covering curriculum-aligned topics

packages.name: Half-Day Experience
packages.description: Complete STEM experience combining live demonstrations with hands-on activities where students become scientists

packages.name: Custom Project
packages.description: Perfect for school-wide science fairs, STEM weeks, and large events. Fully customizable.

signature_experiments.name: Elephant Toothpaste
signature_experiments.description: Dramatic foam explosion demonstrating catalysis and decomposition. The foam is created by rapid decomposition of hydrogen peroxide catalyzed by potassium iodide.

signature_experiments.name: Dry Ice Fog
signature_experiments.description: Spectacular fog effects demonstrating sublimation - dry ice (frozen CO2) transforms directly from solid to gas, creating dramatic fog.

signature_experiments.name: Static Electricity
signature_experiments.description: Hair-raising demonstrations of electron transfer and electric charge buildup.

signature_experiments.name: Baking Soda Volcano
signature_experiments.description: Classic acid-base reaction between baking soda (base) and vinegar (acid) creating an erupting volcano with CO2 gas.

safety.safety_protocols: All experiments follow strict safety guidelines. Carla is First Aid & CPR AED certified. We use age-appropriate experiments and maintain full insurance coverage.
safety.allergies: Please inform us of any allergies during booking. We can adjust experiments accordingly.

logistics.equipment: We bring ALL equipment and materials needed
logistics.space_required: A classroom or hall works great
logistics.utilities_needed: Access to water and electricity for some experiments
logistics.setup_time: We arrive 30 minutes early to set up
logistics.cleanup: We handle all cleanup after the show

booking.advance_notice: We recommend booking 1-2 weeks in advance
booking.process: Fill the booking form on carlsnewton.com, contact via WhatsApp +971 52 409 8148, or email hello@carlsnewton.com
booking.customization: Shows can be customized to match your curriculum or focus on specific topics
booking.payment: Payment confirmed upon booking via Stripe payment link
booking.cancellation: Please contact us at least 48 hours in advance for rescheduling

differentiators: Led by qualified Chemical Engineer with 10+ years teaching experience
Customizable shows to match your topics
We bring everything - zero preparation needed from schools
Award-winning teaching methodology (students won national science Olympics)

faqs.a: Carls Newton is founded and led by Carla Carvajal, a Chemical Engineer and passionate science educator with over 10 years of experience. Carla graduated with honors from Veracruz Technological Institute and spent 7 years as a bilingual Physics and Chemistry teacher, where her students consistently won at national Science Olympics. She's also been a TV science presenter on 'A Pinch of Science' on Televisa Veracruz and now brings that expertise to schools across the UAE!

faqs.q: Do you bring all the equipment?
faqs.a: Yes! We bring everything needed for the show - all materials, equipment, props, and safety gear. You just provide the space and excited students!
A classroom or hall works great. We need access to water and electricity for some experiments. We arrive 30 minutes early to set up and handle all cleanup.

Absolutely! Safety is our top priority. All experiments follow strict safety protocols. Carla is First Aid & CPR AED certified, and we carry full insurance. We use age-appropriate experiments for each group.
Yes! We can tailor our shows to match your curriculum or focus on specific topics you're studying, like volcanoes, space, or chemical reactions.

faqs.q: What ages are your shows suitable for?
faqs.a: We cater to all ages! From preschoolers (30-45 min shows with age-appropriate content) to high schoolers (Y1-Y8). We adjust complexity, language, and experiments based on the age group.

faqs.q: How far in advance should I book?
faqs.a: We recommend booking 1-2 weeks in advance, especially during busy periods like Science Week. However, contact us even for last-minute requests - we'll do our best to accommodate!
Yes! We serve Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Sharjah, and UAE-wide. Pricing may vary slightly based on location.

faqs.q: What if a student has allergies?
faqs.a: Please inform us of any allergies during booking. We can adjust or substitute experiments to ensure everyone's safety.
Absolutely! Science birthday parties are one of our specialties. It's an unforgettable experience that combines fun with learning!

We offer 4 packages: Preschool Special (Dhs 2,800), Classic Show (Dhs 3,600 - most popular!), Half-Day Experience (Dhs 5,200), and Custom Project for school-wide events (starting from Dhs 8,000). All prices are in UAE Dirhams.

faqs.q: How do I book a show?
faqs.a: Easy! You can book through our website carlsnewton.com, WhatsApp us at +971 52 409 8148, or email hello@carlsnewton.com. We'll send you a payment link to confirm your booking!
